title: siva sankara pahi
sahitya:
shiva shankara pAhi surEsha shrI satpuravAsa mahEsha

anupallavi

 bhava tAraka puSkara kEsha bhavika prada bhava gaurIsha

caraNam

 aravinda sharAntaka purahara sharadaindava lEkhA shEkhara 
uragAncita dhavala kalEbara dviradAjina dhara sarvEshvara

madhyama kAlam

paramEshvara nAtha parAtpara garalAnkita mEcaka kandara 
varada vibhO karuNA sAgara vana tulasI vilvArcita hara
